name: Voeux
description:
In a world full of wastelands, you wander out from your home one day and come upon a carnival with towering walls, haunted by stories of Shadows and Spirits, of danger and ruin. Though you are afraid, you feel inexplicably drawn inside because, after all…

You have a wish.

Voeux is a short game about your journey for purpose. The game is written in second person.

Game Features:

  • Seven endings
  • ~30,000 words
  • 2.5-4 hours of gameplay

Please note: This game contains some mature themes involving death. Player discretion is advised.

Story, writing, and art by Avior.
Logo, GUI, and advanced programming by BáiYù.

Known Issues:

  • OpenDyslexic font displaces text box
  • OpenDyslexic font does not work for centered text and player input/choice text
